ing: 2/3 cup balsamic vinegar, or more to taste
des: "Curry fusion vinaigrette. Regarding the curry powder, I mix my own; however, you can use an Eastern-Indian curry mix. I go to a local spice store, The Spice House, they have different selections on their website."
ins: Stir curry powder into olive oil in a bowl until fully dissolved. Add balsamic vinegar, onion, brown sugar, garlic, and salt; stir until evenly mixed. Refrigerate for flavors to blend, 8 hours to overnight.
